channel.title: Why poeple hate hamachi
channel.description:
i have a hamachi server whilest my other computer gets fixed but currently i have no staff/ or players what isit about hamachi whitch you all hate..
just to le you know , i can port foward im just not alloud on my dads pc (this 1)

item.title: Why poeple hate hamachi
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:243789”][quote author=the soul link=topic=320112.msg2535071#msg2535071 date=1226703064]

You can get viruses, it laggs a lot, and stuff like that.

And old pedifiles can find out where you live and information on you.
[/quote]Lies.

Not really, I just said that because that’s what I’ve been told.

Well you’ve been told lies then.

That is just complete bullshit :P[/quote]
Well kay, at least you didn’t call me complete bullshit

Read full topic

item.title: Why poeple hate hamachi
item.dc:creator: @joeyjoe9876 joeyjoe9876
item.description:
@joeyjoe9876 wrote:

the only probelm about hamachi is the no-ip duc stuff, cause if you refresh your duc then it sets back to your routers ip not the hamachi ip, so if your having that problem just go to the no-ip website change to the hamachi ip and exit out of your no-ip duc because thats wat i do adn my server works fine lol heres a pic of my null on it tho -.-

Read full topic

the good of hamachi is it wont allow syis.

item.title: Why poeple hate hamachi
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

`Worx:

We hate hamachi because idiots like you use it…

Sdfu 'tard. Read what you said.

sticky wicky:

i have a hamachi server whilest my other computer gets fixed but currently i have no staff/ or players what isit about hamachi whitch you all hate…

Because…
1.) People gave it a bad rep of it by idiots advertising their server on the forums with it
2.) SUPPOSIBLY unstable <— doubt it
3.) Easy way out of not port fowarding
4.) Must use a password to connect to it being annoying or something
